item.description:
During this free webinar on 

7 Simple Strategies to Profit From Facebook Marketing

you will learn how to use Facebook to increase your authority, collect hot leads, and drive quality traffic to your site . . . 

Here is exactly how this webinar will instantly transform your brand and your business:

• Super Fans: What They Are and Why You Need Them 
• The 3 biggest mistakes most people make on Facebook
• 4 Smart Strategies to Grow a Lucrative Fan Base 
• Quick Tips to Get Your Fans Talking and Engaged 

Note From Amy: "I'm so glad you are going to sign up for this webinar! As you might have heard, Facebook is fast approaching ONE BILLION members. Imagine what all those visitors, leads and customers will do for your business. Join me for an action-packed webinar where we will explore ways to skyrocket your business!" - Amy Porterfield, co-author of Facebook Marketing All-In-One for Dummies

Sign up now and I'll see you on the webinar!

To attend RSVP Yes then click here to register to attend this Webinar for FREE

About Amy Porterfield:

  • My marketing journey started with Harley-Davidson Motorcycles where I managed events and marketing campaigns.
  • Six+ years directing the content and marketing behind Peak Performance Coach and Entrepreneur Anthony Robbins.
  • Two years working with the online heavy hitters Traffic Geyser. I’m pleased to say that I project managed two of their largest Internet product launches ever.
  • Was the Facebook Community Manager for SocialMediaExaminer.com 
  • I’m a social media strategist and create online information and training products to help you get REAL results with social media.

 

To attend RSVP Yes, then click here to register to attend the Webinar for FREE.
item.name: 7 Simple Strategies to Profit From Facebook Marketing - Webinar
